noteBody:
```
node --inspect-brk app.js
```

In Chrome, enter in the address bar:

```
about:inspect
```

Click on:

```
Open dedicated DevTools for Node
```

How I found it:

[https://medium.com/@paul_irish/debugging-node-js-nightlies-with-chrome-devtools-7c4a1b95ae27#.pmqejrn8q](https://medium.com/@paul_irish/debugging-node-js-nightlies-with-chrome-devtools-7c4a1b95ae27#.pmqejrn8q)

Documentation:

[https://nodejs.org/en/docs/guides/debugging-getting-started/](https://nodejs.org/en/docs/guides/debugging-getting-started/)
